Georgie Porgie didn't suffer from philemaphobia, a fear of this
While Mary, Mary was quite contrary, she didn't seem to have anthophobia, a fear of these
As he may have had peniaphobia, a fear of poverty, he was in the counting-house counting all his money
Eve Plumb said, "Marcia, Marcia, Marcia!" as this middle daughter on "The Brady Bunch"

Anne Baxter played Evelyn Heath in "Guest in the House" & Eve Harrington in this 1950 film

rounds.category: ONE OF THESE KINGS IS NOT LIKE THE OTHERS
rounds.comments: (Ken: Because he ruled a different country from the other two.)

In the epic "Argonautica", Eros' arrow makes Medea fall in love with this man
In Greek myth Eros was often the son of this love & beauty goddess by any of several godly fathers
The Romans called Eros Cupid or this, which they also put after "Omnia Vincit"
Hesiod listed Eros as one of the primordial deities along with Gaia & this amorphous, messy one
This word for the mind shares a name with a girl loved by Eros
Governments deal with monopolies by using these sorts of laws that sound like they literally don't have faith
The monetary system called this standard allows holders to exchange currency for No. 79 on the periodic table
A strongly free-market school of economics is named for the university of this Midwestern city
"Diminutive" term for selling unowned stock shares on the gamble that the price will fall
Give us an "A" for this word that can mean paying off a debt in installments or by paying into a sinking fund

Theon's greatest work, available online, has mathematics useful for understanding this founder of the Academy
Writing on these, Theon covers, among others, the circular, oblong, prime & even ones
Theon seems to have lived at the same time that this Roman emperor was building his famous wall

Despite that whole Yorktown debacle, he later fought in Asia & Ireland with great success
Moses received the law from God on this peninsula now part of Egypt

Vietnam & China both claim the Paracel islands, which include Rocky Island & Woody Island, in this body of water
It's been Wonder Woman's corporate home since the 1940s
